description: Web Workers, Service Workers, Shared Workers – whew, parallelism on the web sure sounds like a lot of work! In this talk, though, I'll show how it's really not such a hard concept to grasp, and how you can harness these powerful APIs to bring a smoother framerate and offline capabilities to your web app.
title: Nolan Lawson - Demystifying Web Workers and Service Workers - CascadiaFest 2016
